group_1.textLeft: ...Hey, what does the culprit really want?
The seeds I found were placed where they'd@be easy to find.
...I know she's trying to cause trouble and@cancel the school festival.
But...I have a feeling there's more to it than@that...
I still can't figure out why she would want to@cancel the school festival...
I was thinking that maybe if we knew@her motive, we could get her to stop...
Everyone else is working so hard, but why is@she disrupting that?

group_1.textRight: ...I'm not sure if this applies to the culprit,@but...
There are those who hate the existence of@the school festival...

group_1.textLeft: Hate... There are people like that?

group_1.textRight: While I was busy doing committee work...
There were some people who did not appear@willing to participate...
Even though the majority of us are@anticipating it.
I suppose not everyone looks forward to the@school festival...

group_1.textCenter: With no budget and no time, isn't it impossible@to reorder?
Let's just give up and leave it at that.

group_1.textRight: ...Ugh...it's too much trouble...@Just do it with people who actually care.

group_1.textLeft: I might have seen people like that...

group_1.textRight: ...Yes, when I think back on it, it's true...
It would be best if everyone could@enjoy themselves.
But people from different backgrounds@think differently, so...

group_1.textLeft: I thought the school festival was something@that everyone looked forward to...

select.textSelect: I wonder why the person behind@the threatening letter isn't@able to enjoy it...
But, school festivals are supposed to be fun!
